ygData.subject: New Weapon Sketches!
ygData.msgSnippet: Any of you guys have any information about the new Pottery weapon sketches that were found?  I was reading about them on the eqvault trade board and it seems
ygData.messageBody:
Any of you guys have any information about the new Pottery weapon sketches
that were found? I was reading about them on the eqvault trade board and it
seems that several people have found weapon sketches for pottery that were
implemented with the new pottery changes. From what I've heard, they were
found on an npc on a remote island in the Ocean of Tears. Seems there are a
good variety of different sketchs...all weapons. Nobody that i know of has
successfully made the items that the sketches fashion yet, because the
materials are unknown as of yet. It is also not known whether they actually
make weapons themselves or that they make molds that can then be used for
blacksmithing (which seems more likely of the two). I'd love to hear any
additional information anyone may have! This could be a breakthrough for us
potters =)

---- Greiger Matheson
